mapper.select: select * from reservation r where r.user_id = #{userId} and r.reservation_date = CURDATE() and CURTIME() between r.start and r.end limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (user_id, seat_id, start, end, reservation_date) value (#{userId}, #{seatId}, #{start}, #{end}, #{date})
mapper.select: select * from user where serial= #{serial} limit 1
